Name: SQL - Backup Database
Description: Backup a MS SQL Server database to the file system.

Parameters.Name: Server
Parameters.Label: Server
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the SQL Server instance that the database resides in.

Parameters.Name: Database
Parameters.Label: Database
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the database to back up.

Parameters.Name: BackupDirectory
Parameters.Label: Backup Directory
Parameters.HelpText: The output directory to drop the database backup into.

Parameters.Name: SqlLogin
Parameters.Label: SQL login
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL auth login to connect with. If specified, the SQL Password must also be entered.

Parameters.Name: SqlPassword
Parameters.Label: SQL password
Parameters.HelpText: The password for the SQL auth login to connect with. Only used if SQL Login is specified.

Parameters.Name: Compression
Parameters.Label: Compression Option
Parameters.HelpText:
- 0  -   Use the default backup compression server configuration
- 1  -   Enable the backup compression
- 2  -   Disable the backup compression

Parameters.Name: Devices
Parameters.Label: Devices
Parameters.HelpText: The number of backup devices to use for the backup.

Parameters.Name: Stamp
Parameters.Label: Backup file suffix
Parameters.HelpText: Specify a suffix to add to the backup file names. If left blank the backup will use the current timestamp.

Parameters.Name: UseSqlServerTimeStamp
Parameters.Label: Use SQL Server timestamp format
Parameters.HelpText: If no suffix is specified, use the MSSQL timestamp format.

Parameters.Name: ConnectionTimeout
Parameters.Label: Connection Timeout
Parameters.HelpText: Specify the connection timeout settings (in seconds) for the SQL connection. If the backup takes longer than this value, the backup will fail.

Parameters.Name: CopyOnly
Parameters.Label: Copy Only
Parameters.HelpText: Specify whether the backup is Copy Only

Parameters.Name: RetentionPolicyEnabled
Parameters.Label: Retention Policy Enabled
Parameters.HelpText: Specify if a limit should be imposed on retaining older backups

Parameters.Name: RetentionPolicyCount
Parameters.Label: Retention Policy Count
Parameters.HelpText: Specify how many old copies of the DB should be retained (only if Retention Policy Enabled is true)
